title: Calories in Cool Whip
meta_description: Discover calories in Cool Whip per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including fat, carbs, sugars, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Original Cool Whip whipped topping; standard serving size of 2 tbsp (9 g); non-dairy, unprepared from tub.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, product type (e.g., original vs. lite), serving size, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving (2 tbsp) of Cool Whip provides 25 kcal with 3 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add fresh strawberries (1/4 cup per serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Cool Whip?
faqs.a: About 25 kcal per 2 tbsp serving of original Cool Whip.

faqs.q: Is Cool Whip low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 1.5 g total fat (all saturated) per serving, making it a lighter dessert topping.
2 g of sugars per 2 tbsp serving, primarily from added sweeteners.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between original and lite Cool Whip?
faqs.a: Lite has about 15 kcal per serving, 10 kcal less than original.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Cool Whip?
faqs.a: 3 g carbs per serving, with no fiber and mostly from sugars.
